title: 3 Shades of Wolf

Her boyfriend has walked out on her, and she had been left alone with no family to rely on. She is also secretly dealing with the changes in her body after being bitten by a werewolf named Carmen. Carmen, however, was killed before explaining to her what she would become.Ever meets Mick Sten and finds herself under his tender holistic touch.
